{%- macro render_link_children(link,depth)-%} {%- if link!= [] && link.label -%} {{link.label}} {%- endif -%} {%- endmacro -%} {%- macro render_link_item(link,depth)-%} {%- if link != [] && link.label -%} {%- if link.children -%}
  • {{link.label}}
    {%- set depth = depth + 1%} {%- for sublink in link.children -%} {{render_link_children(sublink,depth)}} {%- endfor -%}
    • {%- else -%}
  • {{link.label}}
    • {%- endif -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endmacro -%}
    {% set menu = menu(module.menu_field , "site_root").children %}
      {% for link in menu %} {{render_link_item(link,1)}} {% endfor %}
